name: RandomizeJumps!
description:
Race against time, jumping across platforms randomly placed on the level. But remember, if you die, something will change in the game.

Features:

The game have a Random Level generator, good models and animations, and some gameplay features.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Space (On air) - Double jump

Space(On wall) - Wall jump

Left Click - Shot

Esc - Back (Menus)

Alt + F4 Close game '-'
